tech_news.title: In Kirby Air Riders, expression is more fun than racing - The Verge
tech_news.description: Kirby Air Riders on the Nintendo Switch 2, a sequel to the quirky GameCube racing game, has a robust suite of customization options that are fun to play with.

tech_news.title: Sony’s PlayStation Portal just got a rare discount for Black Friday - The Verge
tech_news.description: Sony’s PlayStation Portal rarely goes on sale, but now it’s currently at an all-time low price thanks to this Black Friday sale.

tech_news.title: Apple, IBD Stock Of The Day, Sets Up Before Holiday Season - Investor's Business Daily
tech_news.description: The consumer electronics giant prepares for a busy shopping season.

tech_news.title: Ubisoft Reveals Teammates – An AI Experiment to Change the Game - Ubisoft
tech_news.description: The team behind last year’s Neo NPC is building on their experience to develop the future of generative play as an enhancement to gameplay with a new experimental experience already launched as a closed playtest.

tech_news.title: Starting today, Full Screen Experience for Windows 11 PCs is available for Xbox Insiders! - Xbox Wire
Microsoft: Out-of-band update fixes Windows 11 hotpatch install loop - BleepingComputer
tech_news.description: Microsoft has released an out-of-band cumulative update to fix a known issue causing the November 2025 KB5068966 hotpatch update to reinstall on Windows 11 systems repeatedly.

tech_news.title: Any future Hollow Knight games after Silksong would "exist alongside" the others as standalone entries, says Team Cherry - Eurogamer
tech_news.description: Team Cherry has teased more Hollow Knight releases beyond Silksong.

tech_news.title: Apple’s cheapest iPad is already $70 off for Black Friday - The Verge
tech_news.description: Apple’s 11th-gen iPad is down to a record low price of $279 ($70 off) for Black Friday. The latest iPad Pro and iPad Air are also on sale.

tech_news.title: The Analogue 3D will be available again next week, but with a $20 price bump - The Verge
tech_news.description: ﻿The company is blaming tariffs for the price increase from $249.99 to $269.99.
